text: Venus is a British comedy-drama movie. It stars Peter O'Toole, Leslie Phillips, Vanessa Redgrave, Richard Griffiths, and Jodie Whittaker. It is directed by Roger Michell and written by Hanif Kureishi. It was released to positive reviews on December 21, 2006. Category:2006 comedy-drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Roger Michell
title: Venus (movie)
